ckd-v1.0.0.description:
We have logic!
# Info
* Only the US 1.0 version is supported
  * MD5 US 1.0: `30c5f292ff4cbbfcc00fd8fa96c2de3b`
* Universal Tracker support
* This apworld is equal to the DKC v1.0.5 implementation in terms of features and known issues
* Based on [rainbowsprinklez and vervalkon's DKC Mirrored hack](https://romhackplaza.org/romhacks/donkey-kong-country-mirrored-snes/)
# Changes
## Additions
* Logic
  * Huge thanks to Kenny for providing the entire logic for the game
* Added a manifest file for AP 0.7.0+ support
## Adjustments & Fixes
* Winky's Walkway
  * Moved G letter to be easily obtainable
  * Adjusted Banana Bunch #4 to not fall off the platform
* Mine Cart Carnage
  * Adjusted the starting area to force having Barrels in the level from the very start
  * Removed the warp barrel
  * Removed Banana Bunch #1
* Stop & Go Station
  * Fixed checks not being sent
* Tree Top Town
  * Adjusted Gnawties after the midpoint to not hurt DK after being blasted from the Kannon
  * Adjusted an automatic Kannon not shooting directly into a Kannon
* Temple Tempest
  * Fixed checks not being sent
* Clam City
  * Fixed checks not being sent
* Slipslide Ride
  * Moved some Zingers so they can be reacted to or feel more fair as an obstacle
  * Rearranged the Banana bunches near N to properly appear
  * Adjusted Banana Bunch #10 to not fall off the ledge
  * Bonus #3 no longer sends you directly into a Zinger
  * Moved back the Kritter before the O letter so it becomes easier to reach
  * Adjusted the setup after de Checkpoint barrel to get an earlier blue rope spawn
  * Moved up the Zinger at the last falling section so you can actually see it
  * Moved back the Kritters at the end of the level so the Bonus #1 becomes easier to reach
* Croctopus Chase
  * Moved Enguarde Token outside of the secret area
  * Removed banana bunches from the secret area
  * Moved O letter to be obtainable if barrels are active
* Rope Bridge Rumble
  * Added a platform to make a jump a lot more bearable near bonus #2
* Oil Drum Alley
  * Added a banana trail showing the safe path in a blind jump after the O letter
* Trick Track Trek
  * Adjusted platform path at the end to allow reaching the level exit without Diddy
  * Fixed checks not being sent
* Elevator Antics
  * Moved Mini Necky at the start to ensure a safer jump
* Poison Pond
  * Moved some mincers around to ensure the level feels fair (the level still is terrible)
  * Fixed checks not being sent
* Mine Cart Madness
  * Moved O letter so it can be obtained
  * Moved N letter to a slightly better place to avoid weird Mine Cart interactions
  * Altered the terrain and obstacles at the end of the level to ensure Kongs can reach safely the exit with the least amount of jank
* Blackout Basement
  * Unearthed O letter because it was highly inconsistent (also was near a cliff, so it'd fall off anyway)
* Tanked Up Trouble
  * Adjusted the Zinger trio at the start of the track, now it's a duo
  * Removed barrel kannon from the start which was pointless in this hack
  * Removed an additional banana bunch at the start of the level
  * Adjusted the platform velocity near the O letter
ckd-v1.0.0.title: yrtnuoC gnoK yeknoD v1.0.0

ckd-v1.1.0.description:
Big if True: tm: additions
# Info
* Only the US 1.0 version is supported
  * MD5 US 1.0: `30c5f292ff4cbbfcc00fd8fa96c2de3b`
* Universal Tracker support
* This apworld is equal to the DKC v1.1.0 implementation in terms of features and known issues
* Based on [rainbowsprinklez and vervalkon's DKC Mirrored hack](https://romhackplaza.org/romhacks/donkey-kong-country-mirrored-snes/)
# Changes
## Additions
* Added Cache Detector item
  * It will detect the nearest cache and draw a fast spinning banana on it
* Added manifest file for AP 0.7.0+
## Adjustments
* Guaranteed successful generations on restrictive-ish starts
  * Makes fuzzer happy (lol)
ckd-v1.1.0.title: yrtnuoC gnoK yeknoD v1.1.0
